tree.text: Ah. A fellow seeker of Runes, I see.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Oh! I, uh, didn't know that was yours. Sorry.
No need to worry over it. I can sense power in you. I believe you can do much more with it.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Wait, really? What do you sense?

dialogue.text: I can answer any question you have.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: So, who are you?
Heh.
A sinner on the road to atonement. Nothing more, nothing less.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text:
Oh, huh.
(A sinner? I wonder what she did? It doesn't seem like she wants to discuss it further.)

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: What's the deal with these Runes?
They are artifacts of an older time, a time before peace. These stones absorbed the magic of war, and now lay dormant.
Like most things of that time, these Runes now lie in ruins, granting magic to those who can wield them.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: Oh, I see. What do you need them for?
...Like these Runes, I know the pain and ruin of conflict. If I can fix anything, it will be through their magic.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: Oh... I'm sorry to hear that.
Don't let it trouble you. This is my quest. You surely have yours as well.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: What... power do you see in me?
I'm sure you know better than I. The dark gift at your core. Your shapeshifting.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: W-wait, you can see that??
You have no need to worry, I am a friend. I can also see that your heart is kind. Dark magic needs a dark heart to make a monster, after all.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: So... you don't think I'm a monster?
Between us, it is I that is most monsterous, and I have kept my darkness tame for decades. You have no need to worry.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: Thank you... that's relieving to hear.
Of course.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: Well, I have to go. Thank you for talking with me.
Of course. Stay safe, I sense dark hearts around.
